messages.content: Show me an overview of all active campaigns

### Key Insights:

**üî¥ Needs Attention:**
- **Apex Motors** - Behind pacing with poor health. Low CTR (0.12%), especially on mobile. Germany geo is underperforming (0.04% CTR).

**‚ö†Ô∏è Monitor Closely:**
- **TechFlow SaaS** - Overspending budget ($3,200 over). However, strong CTR (0.6%) shows good creative performance.

**‚úÖ Performing Well:**
- **SportMax Apparel** - Best overall performance with strong video completion (85%) and efficient CPA ($234.65)
- **FinanceFirst Bank** - High viewability (85%) and on track
- **GreenEnergy Co** - Efficient CPA, California performing best
